comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x1 be the number of regular tacos made and x2 be the number of deluxe tacos made. Both x1 and x2 are non-negative integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x1 \geq 0",
        "x2 \geq 0",
        "x1 \leq 50",
        "x2 \leq 40",
        "x1 + x2 \leq 70"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize profit: Maximize 2.50*x1 + 3.55*x2"
}
